name: Contractor
highlight: Specializing in Jamstack, I've been helping companies speed up their sites using GatsbyJS and multiple headless CMSs including Contentful and Wordpress.
notes: FullStory.com
stord.com

name: FullStory
highlight: Another developer and I rebuilt fullstory.com (marketing site) from the ground up using React and the Jamstack tool Gatsby
notes: Rebuilt fullstory.com (marketing site) from the ground up in ReactJS and SCSS-like plugins with PostCSS
High profile pages built from the ground up using leaner CSS and React to match previous designs
Worked with design and the creative team to build new pages, as well as develop a reusable component library to help iterate faster on design and development
Sourced site content from Contentful CMS to enable non-devs ability to update site content
Rebuilt blog using GatsbyJS and custom migrated all content from Ghost.io to Wordpress (as a backend)

name: Brightwell, Inc
highlight: Planned and implemented the path towards moving the user facing website off of .NET MVC 5 and onto a React webclient, and led other developers on how to follow best practices
notes: Worked with multiple designers to bring the web app into a fully responsive site
Heavy work towards full code coverage on the React app as well as several integration tests for smoke testing using Cypress.js
Implemented new ServiceStack APIs, externally RESTful and internally using a message queue to move towards a microservice architecture
Built a scraping service in Node.js using the latest JS features (async/await, classes, etc)
Helped build a new agile team by implementing proven processes and dynamics

name: three five two
highlight: Successfully launched and delivered multiple projects on time with high client satisfaction
notes: Projects built using Node.js REST servers with React/Redux webclients
Working as tech lead providing support for both back-end and front-end developers
Architected Node.js Express server using well known patterns and conventions
Servers typically interacted with either MongoDB or PostgresSQL
All projects required at least one 3rd party integration, but usually many
Worked closely with clients and Scrum Master to gather requirements

name: RentPath
highlight: Helped build and maintain the SaaS for rentees to list properties
notes: Researched and implemented modern design patterns using Less CSS and jQuery interactions
Most features built via paired-programming
Restructured JavaScript into more manageable object oriented patterns
Rebuilt main MVC2 app as MVC5 with Razor

name: Kabbage
highlight: Worked on the main integration team, consuming several APIs for data analysis
notes: Integrated with several 3rd-party APIs to pull customer’s data
Connected via OAuth, Certs, and various Homegrown Authentication
Mapped XML, JSON data to store in Sql Server and Amazon S3
Built C# flat-file parsing engine that can handle standard flat-file and COBOL style output files/reports
Implemented new features on ASP.NET MVC 3 & 4 platform
Enhanced internal APIs to prepare for public consumption
Wrote SQL queries to support Production Operations
Built C# applications (console, WPF) to support QA
Built and enhanced business logic for handling customer experience

name: ThePort Network
highlight: Built and maintained a branded social-networking platform
notes: Added front-end functionality using jQuery, jsRender, Ajax, JSON, and Razor
Built underlying functionality for the forums feature via C# and NHibernate
Developed prototypes and production level features in their legacy platform
Wrote  SOLR, NHibernate, and SQL queries for reports and data pulls
Integrated Google Maps with the platform’s events feature using Javascript
Wrote integration and Moq unit tests for the new platform in C#
Fixed back-end to front-end bugs in the legacy social media platform, working with Sql Server, ASP.NET, NHibernate, and XSLT
Built SQL reports for internal and external use
Helped bring a backlogged Parature ticketing system up to a more responsive support desk nearing a weekly 1 ticket in, 1 ticket out ratio
Began as a Project Manager overseeing the implementation of the platform for several clients
